channel.title: Rsc OB3 model viewer/Converter realse
channel.description:
Hello,
Well ive decied to realse a beta version of the viewer and converter all it dose atm is View the obj format (Look in /Models/ for the obj models 427 of them are there) and you can convert them to a OB3 format...
Todo: Fix the jag repacking Color map Fix the OB3 model viewing and allow to be converterd to OBJ
Picture of a market stall [img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/2442/ss20090415161403.png[/img] [img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/6186/ss20090415161433.png[/img]
Note: when converting the models into OB3 all of the sides will be put onto texture 0 if you want to edit that just change the
[code] int currentTexture = 0;[/code]
Download: http://65.75.244.119/rsc.rar
The rar contains all the rsc models in OBJ format Java 3d jars just incase you have not got it installed onto your pc and the source code
~T X

@n3ss3s wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:4, topic:273578”]Hmmmm, everytime I try to load a model it prints out that it is loaded yet on the viewer nothing show up.

Say im tryin got load “BLUEFLOWER.OB3.OBJ”, the cmd windoes prints out “BLUEFLOWER.OB3.OBJ” but nothing shows up in the viewer.

Any idea why?[/quote]try BLUEFLOWER.OB3.obj if that dose not work add my msn project-503@live.co.uk

Spotted the problim why caps ant working

item.title: Rsc OB3 model viewer/Converter realse
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Hmmmm, everytime I try to load a model it prints out that it is loaded yet on the viewer nothing show up.

Say im tryin got load “BLUEFLOWER.OB3.OBJ”, the cmd windoes prints out “BLUEFLOWER.OB3.OBJ” but nothing shows up in the viewer.

Any idea why?

Could this have anything todo with it not finding “SubstanceBusinessBlackSteelLookAndFeel”, I doubt it since its just a skin.

Read full topic
